TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CircleHotSpot extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot
Public NotInheritable Class CircleHotSpot Inherits HotSpot
public ref class CircleHotSpot sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::HotSpot

summary.span: Defines a circular hot spot region in an control.

span.span: Defines a circular hot spot region in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类定义中的一个圆形作用点区域控件。This class defines a circle-shaped hot spot region in an control. 若要定义的区域对象，设置属性表示的圆形区域的中心的 x 坐标值。To define the region of the object, set the property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the center of the circular region. 设置属性表示的圆形区域的中心的 y 坐标值。Set the property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the center of the circular region. 设置从的边缘圆的中心属性之间的距离。Set the property to the distance from the center of the circle to the edge. 当单击控件、 页面导航到 URL、 生成回发到服务器，或不执行任何操作。When a control is clicked, the page either navigates to a URL, generates a post back to the server, or does nothing. 属性指定此行为。The property specifies this behavior. 若要导航到的 URL，将设置属性`HotSpotMode.Navigate`，并使用属性来指定要导航到的 URL。To navigate to a URL, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, and use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要将发布回服务器，设置属性`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，并使用属性指定的名称对象。To post back to the server, set the property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, and use the property to specify a name for the object. 此名称将传递中事件数据时单击。This name will be passed in the event data when the is clicked. 如果你想对象不具有任何行为，将设置属性`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。If you want the object to have no behavior, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个控件对象。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Navigate`，这导致页后，可以导航到所指定 URL 每次用户单击某个作用点区域。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, which causes the page to navigate to the specified URL each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass1/CS/imagemapclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass1/VB/imagemapclass1vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建两个对象，设置其属性，并将其添加到控件的。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create two objects, set their properties, and add them to the control's . 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetCoordinates() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetCoordinates () As String

summary.span: Returns a string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a object's center and the length of its radius.

span.span: Returns a string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a object's center and the length of its radius.

returns.span: A string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a object's center and the length of its radius.

span.span: A string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a object's center and the length of its radius.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用的值分配给和要返回中心坐标，并赋予的值属性属性以返回半径。This method uses the values assigned to the and properties to return the center coordinates and the value assigned to the property to return the radius. 方法为内部 ASP.NET 可用于获取要使用的坐标的文本呈现时。The method is used internally by ASP.NET to get the text to use for the coordinates of a when it is rendered. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个控件对象。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 当用户单击其中一个对象，方法返回其坐标，并为用户显示它们。When a user clicks one of the objects, the method returns its coordinates and displays them to the user. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[CircleHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CircleHotSpot.GetCoordinates/CS/circlehotspot.getcoordinatescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CircleHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CircleHotSpot.GetCoordinates/VB/circlehotspot.getcoordinatesvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the distance from the center to the edge of the circular region defined by this object.

span.span: Gets or sets the distance from the center to the edge of the circular region defined by this object.

value.span: 一个整数，表示从中心到此定义的循环区域边缘的以像素为单位的距离对象。

span.span: An integer that represents the distance in pixels from the center to the edge of the circular region defined by this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您获取或设置一个值，以像素为单位的距离从中心表示此定义的循环区域边缘对象。The property allows you to get or set a value that represents the distance in pixels from the center to the edge of the circular region defined by this object. 若要完全定义对象，你必须指定的值属性以及和属性。To completely define a object, you must specify a value for the property as well as the and properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建包含两个控件对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains two objects. 以声明方式; 创建一个其， ，和同样以声明方式设置属性。One is created declaratively; its , , and properties are likewise set declaratively. 其他以编程方式创建并将其， ，和以编程方式设置属性。The other is created programmatically and its , , and properties are set programmatically. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供自己的映像为属性和更新的路径映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it.
